pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Estimation of the Yield Curve Evolution // Nonparametric estimation of discount functions and yield curves from transaction data of coupon paying bonds. Koo, B., La Vecchia, D., Linton, O. B. (2021) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.04.014 describe an application of this package using the Center for Research in Security Prices (CRSP) Bond Data and document its implementation.
